title: Horror Music Pack 1 - BookshelfMusic
description: Creepy looped horror tracks with added FX, can be looped and layered to create incredible horror soundscapes!
longDescription:
The pack contains a number of loopable ambient tracks, and more lively "tension builders" which can be played over the top to increase player suspense. Also included are a number of one-shot FX audio files which can be used to signify environmental clues, triggers, or create an even creepier atmosphere.


DEMO HERE: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=6umk_9eUyIw


Tracks are made froma wide range of sources, including orchestral music, electronic sounds, creaks, broken clocks, music boxes, and more.
technicalDetails:
Features: (Please include a full, comprehensive list of the features of the product)

  •  20 looped ambient tracks (09:30 long) - can be played at low level during gameplay.
  •  20 looped "Tension " tracks (09:30 long) - the can be played over the top of the ambient tracks in the run up to key moments, to build up atmosphere
  •  13 Sound FX tracks (varying length) - can be triggered at key points or to highlight gameplay moments. These include sounds like creaks, broken clocks, and a creepy music box.

Number of Audio Wavs: 53

Number of Audio Cues: 53

Sample rate: 44,100 Hz

Does music loop: (Yes)

Minutes of audio provided: 380 minutes

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
